title: Big Tech's Growth and Innovation Slow, But Its Market Dominance Endures
description: The top U.S. technology companies are no longer big, fast-growing and ferociously innovative. Their market positions still look durable.

title: Blind Software Engineer Expanded Access to Braille
description: John J. Boyer, who has died at age 86, produced programs that help to translate text into braille, create braille textbooks and ease reading of material displayed on computers.

title: What Is Electrochemistry, and Why Is It So Important to a Green-Energy Future?
description: A host of startups are scrambling to hire electrochemists who they hope will usher in a new era of cleaner energy.

title: Guns Offered for Sale in Facebook Groups Devoted to Religious Extremists in India
description: Facebook rejected complaints about the posts violating the company’s rules, then later took the posts down.

title: Microsoft's Activision Deal Handed Setback by U.K. Regulator
description: U.K. antitrust regulators said the proposed $75 billion acquisition would further consolidate what it called Microsoft’s strong position in cloud gaming.

title: Uber Posts Higher Revenue and Adjusted Profit
description: The ride-hailing company beat Wall Street estimates and projected accelerated bookings growth.

title: Former Twitter Executives to Face GOP Scrutiny on Hunter Biden Laptop Decisions
description: House Oversight panel hearing kicks off broader inquiry into social-media content moderation.

title: TikTok's Secret Sauce Poses Challenge for U.S. Oversight, Researchers Say
description: Concerns mount over TikTok’s plan to address potential Chinese influence over what videos Americans see.

title: Google Set to Roll Out New AI Search Features
description: The Alphabet unit plans to describe new types of search results days after Bard, an artificial-intelligence service, is opened for testing.

title: Venture Investors Are Pumping Capital Into 3-D Printing Startups. Here's Why.
description: Investors committed a record amount of venture dollars into the sector last year.

title: Omnicom CEO Wants to Embrace Generative AI as Quickly as Possible
description: Advertising giant is bullish on automation as it reports organic fourth-quarter revenue growth of 7.2%.
